entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
